descriptionNullable:
🛍️ US Stores Sales 🛍️


US Stores Sales Between 2010 and 2011 ----

🔐 Dataset File 🔐

sales.csv

❓ Description ❓

This dataset contains information about Sales Values in Dollars on American Stores between 2010 and 2011. In particular, this dataset contains: - Stores' Area, State, Region and Size; - Products' ID, Description, Type, Category and Sale Date; - Accounting Info, such as Budget Margin, Profit, Total Expenses and Marking.
The data was extracted between January 1th in 2010 and December 31th in 2011.

📝 Variables 📝

The file `sales.csv` contains a huge table of US Stores Sales info in the following columns:
- `Area Code`: Store's Code; - `State`: Store's State; - `Market`: Store's Region; - `Market Size`: Store's Size; - `Profit`: Profits in Dollars ($); - `Margin`: Profit + Total Expenses ($) OR Sales - COGS ($); - `Sales`: Values Acquired in Sales ($); - `COGS`: Cost of Goods Sold ($); - `Total Expenses`: Total Expenses to get the Product to Sell ($); - `Marketing`: Expenses in Marketing ($); - `Inventory`: Inventory Value of the Product in the Sale Moment ($); - `Budget Profit`: Expected Profit ($); - `Budget COGS`: Expected COGS ($); - `Budget Margin`: Expected Profit + Expected Total Expenses ($) OR Expected Sales - Expected COGS ($); - `Budget Sales`: Expected Value Acquired in Sales ($); - `ProductID`: Product ID; - `Date`: Sale Date; - `Product Type`: Product Category; - `Product`: Product Description; - `Type`: Type;
title: US Stores Sales
subtitle: US Stores Sales Between 2010 and 2011
